description: David McGoldrick scores twice as Notts County boost their automatic promotion push with an emphatic League Two win over Accrington.
title: Accrington Stanley 0-3 Notts County
title_page: League Two: Accrington Stanley 0-3 Notts County - BBC Sport
maintext:
Accrington Stanley are unbeaten across their last four home Football League games against Notts County (W3 D1), scoring 2+ goals in three of those matches.
After winning the reverse fixture 2-0 in September, Notts county will be looking to record a first Football League double over Accrington Stanley since the 2007-08 season.
After winning each of their last two league games, Accrington will be looking to win three matches in succession for just the second time since the start of 2024.
